title: Surf and SUP Lessons
seo_description: Hawaii has a unique and extensive surf history and culture. Take part in it by signing up for a lesson right on Waikiki Beach where Duke Kahanamoku modernized the Hawaiian sport.
contents_1: Hawaii has a unique and extensive surf history and culture. Take part in it by signing up for a lesson right on Waikiki Beach
description: Hawaii has a unique and extensive surf history and culture. Take part in it by signing up for a lesson right on Waikiki Beach where Duke Kahanamoku modernized the Hawaiian sport. If you’re not into surfing, try your hand at Stand Up Paddling, a great experience for all ages and activity levels.
